sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndampro ( EXPERT_ID /* */ , KNWLDG_TY_CODE /* */ , EXPERT_GRAD /* */ , EXPERT_CONFM_DE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , EXPERT_DC /* */ ) VALUES ( #expertId# /* */ , #knwldgTyCode# /* */ , #expertGrad# /* */ , #expertConfmDe# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #expertDc# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndampro SET EXPERT_ID=#expertId# /* */ , KNWLDG_TY_CODE=#knwldgTyCode# /* */ , EXPERT_GRAD=#expertGrad# /* */ , EXPERT_CONFM_DE=#expertConfmDe# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , EXPERT_DC=#expertDc# /* */ WHERE EXPERT_ID=#expertId# /* */ AND KNWLDG_TY_CODE=#knwldgTyCode# /* */ AND EXPERT_GRAD=#expertGrad# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtndampro WHERE EXPERT_ID=#expertId# /* */ AND KNWLDG_TY_CODE=#knwldgTyCode# /* */ AND EXPERT_GRAD=#expertGrad# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT EXPERT_ID /* */ , KNWLDG_TY_CODE /* */ , EXPERT_GRAD /* */ , EXPERT_CONFM_DE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , EXPERT_DC /* */ FROM comtndampro WHERE EXPERT_ID=#expertId# /* */ AND KNWLDG_TY_CODE=#knwldgTyCode# /* */ AND EXPERT_GRAD=#expertGrad# /* */

SELECT EXPERT_ID /* */ , KNWLDG_TY_CODE /* */ , EXPERT_GRAD /* */ , EXPERT_CONFM_DE /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , EXPERT_DC /* */ FROM comtndampro WHERE 1=1
EXPERT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
KNWLDG_TY_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY EXPERT_ID DESC /* */ , KNWLDG_TY_CODE DESC /* */ , EXPERT_GRAD DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtndampro WHERE 1=1
EXPERT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
KNWLDG_TY_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
